long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hico Servers

With this extension all HiCO developers can choose which test environment they prefer to use.  It shows a categorised list of all test servers and it´s product URL´s.

This extension is only a helper tool for those who are in the correct domain.

Feel free to use it and leave suggestions for updates and features. :)

***** RELEASE NOTES *****

- Added new Server for ateis114
- Added small version information section on every product
- Added export and import for the settings

v4.1
- Bugfixing
- Added settings in main view
_ Removed list view

- Updated Server URL´s

v1.9
